description:
Shahawar Matin Siraj is one of many Muslim men convicted in informant-related terrorism cases. Now he’s seeking compassionate release.

The post An Informant Pushed Him to Plot a Subway Bombing. After 20 Years Behind Bars, He Has a Chance at Freedom. appeared first on The Intercept.
title: An Informant Pushed Him to Plot a Subway Bombing. After 20 Years Behind Bars, He Has a Chance at Freedom.

description:
“It was not random, but direct targeting on purpose. Fadi was wearing his press uniform.”

The post Witnesses: Israeli Attacks Directly Targeted Journalists in Northern Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Witnesses: Israeli Attacks Directly Targeted Journalists in Northern Gaza

description:
Jeremy Loffredo was taken into custody on suspicion of “assisting an enemy in war” for his reporting on Iran’s missile attack. 

The post U.S. Journalist Jeremy Loffredo Released After Being Detained by Israel for Four Days  appeared first on The Intercept.
title: U.S. Journalist Jeremy Loffredo Released After Being Detained by Israel for Four Days

description:
While Turkey loudly proclaims its support for Palestinians, officials have blocked a ship intending to break the siege from leaving Istanbul.

The post Turkey Is Obstructing an Effort to Break Gaza’s Siege by Sea appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Turkey Is Obstructing an Effort to Break Gaza’s Siege by Sea
